Global nitf_TRE_clone (nitf_TRE *tre, nitf_Error *error)
This cannot clone the hash table without copying This is a serious problem since this is the first thing people will want to do. Possible solution: put desc inside of the TRE. Alternate possibility: call TRE plugin handler explicitly
